# Sample Document

This is a sample Markdown document for testing cc_markdown.

## Features

This document demonstrates various Markdown features:

### Text Formatting

This is **bold text** and this is *italic text*. You can also use ~~strikethrough~~.

### Lists

Unordered list:
- Item one
- Item two
- Item three

Ordered list:
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

Task list:
- [x] Completed task
- [ ] Pending task

### Code

Inline `code` looks like this.

```python
def hello_world():
    """A simple function."""
    print("Hello, World!")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    hello_world()
```

### Tables

| Feature | Status | Notes |
|---------|--------|-------|
| PDF Output | Done | Uses Playwright |
| Word Output | Done | Uses python-docx |
| HTML Output | Done | Standalone file |

### Blockquotes

> This is a blockquote.
> It can span multiple lines.

### Links

Visit [CenterConsulting](https://www.centerconsulting.com) for more information.

---

## Conclusion

This sample document covers the main Markdown features supported by cc_markdown.
